# Bottie

> AI-powered Google Business Profile review management platform that automatically generates personalized responses to customer reviews

Bottie helps businesses save time and improve their online reputation by using Google's Gemini AI to create professional, contextual replies to customer reviews.

- **Website**: https://bottie.app
- **For**: Small to mid-size business owners, multi-location businesses, agencies
- **Integration**: Google Business Profile (Google My Business)
- **AI Engine**: Google Gemini 3 Flash

## What Bottie Does

Bottie automatically generates and manages responses to Google Business Profile reviews, saving businesses hours every week while maintaining their unique brand voice.

### The Problem We Solve

- **Time Drain**: Responding to every review manually takes hours each week
- **Inconsistent Voice**: Hard to maintain brand consistency across many responses
- **Missed Opportunities**: Negative reviews often go unanswered, damaging reputation
- **Lost Insights**: Reviews contain valuable feedback that's difficult to analyze
- **Multi-Location Complexity**: Managing reviews across multiple businesses is overwhelming

### Who It's For

- **Small Business Owners**: Restaurants, salons, retail stores, service providers
- **Multi-Location Businesses**: Chains managing 2-5+ locations
- **Marketing Agencies**: Managing reviews for multiple clients
- **Reputation Managers**: Teams focused on online presence
- **Any Business Using Google Business Profile**: If you appear on Google Maps, Bottie can help

## Core Features

### 1. AI-Powered Review Responses

- **Automatic Generation**: AI creates personalized responses within minutes of receiving a review
- **Context-Aware**: Analyzes review content, rating, and sentiment to craft appropriate replies
- **Natural Language**: Responses sound human, not robotic or templated
- **Multi-Language**: Supports English and Hebrew with auto-detection

### 2. Complete Customization

#### Tone of Voice
Choose how AI responds to your reviews:
- **Professional**: Formal and business-appropriate
- **Friendly**: Warm and approachable
- **Humorous**: Light and playful (when appropriate)
- **Formal**: Traditional and respectful

#### Per-Rating Customization
Different instructions for each star rating:
- **5-Star Reviews**: Emphasize gratitude and encourage future visits
- **4-Star Reviews**: Thank and address minor concerns
- **3-Star Reviews**: Acknowledge feedback and show improvement
- **2-Star Reviews**: Apologize and offer solutions
- **1-Star Reviews**: Include phone number, invite offline resolution

#### Response Settings
- **Language Mode**: Auto-detect, Hebrew, or English
- **Response Length**: 1-3 sentences (recommended: 2)
- **Emoji Control**: Define allowed emojis for personality
- **Custom Signature**: Personalized closing on every response
- **Business Context**: Name, description, phone number for negative reviews

### 3. Flexible Publishing Modes

#### Manual Approval (Default)
- Review every AI-generated response before publishing
- Edit responses to add personal touches
- Regenerate if you want a different approach
- Reject and write your own

#### Full Auto-Publish
- Automatically publish all responses
- AI posts replies within minutes of review arrival
- Perfect for businesses with high review volume

#### Hybrid Mode (Recommended)
- Auto-publish positive reviews (4-5 stars)
- Require approval for critical reviews (1-3 stars)
- Balance automation with quality control

### 4. Review Management Dashboard

- **Centralized View**: All reviews from all locations in one place
- **Advanced Filtering**:
  - Reply status (Pending, Posted, Rejected, Failed)
  - Star rating (1-5 stars)
  - Sentiment (Positive, Neutral, Negative)
  - Date ranges (Last 7/30/90 days, custom)
- **Sorting**: By date, rating, or status
- **Quick Actions**: Edit, publish, regenerate, or reject responses
- **Status Tracking**: See which replies were AI-generated vs. manual

### 5. Analytics & Insights (Pro Plan)

Understand what customers really think:

#### Overview Metrics
- Total reviews received
- Average rating
- Sentiment score (positive/neutral/negative distribution)
- Review trends over time

#### Category Analysis
See what customers mention most:
- **Positive Categories**: Service, Quality, Value, Cleanliness, Atmosphere
- **Improvement Areas**: Wait Time, Communication, Facilities
- **Detailed Breakdown**: Food Quality, Menu Variety, Location, Expertise, Results

#### Trend Visualization
- Review volume over time
- Rating trends (improving or declining)
- Sentiment shifts
- Date range comparison

### 6. Real-Time Notifications

- **Email Alerts**: Get notified instantly when new reviews arrive
- **Weekly AI Summary** (Pro): AI-generated insights every Sunday
  - What customers loved this week
  - Areas needing improvement
  - Sentiment breakdown
  - Actionable recommendations

### 7. Multi-Location Support

- Connect multiple Google Business accounts
- Manage 1-5 locations (depending on plan)
- Per-location customization of AI settings
- Separate analytics for each business
- Disconnect/reconnect locations anytime

### 8. Team Management

- **Owner Role**: Full access to all features and settings
- **Member Role**: Manage reviews and responses
- Invite team members to collaborate
- Role-based permissions

## Pricing

### Free Plan - $0/month
Perfect for trying Bottie risk-free:
- 1 business location
- 10 reviews per month
- Manual approval mode
- Basic customization

### Basic Plan - $29/month ($290/year)
**Most Popular** - For growing businesses:
- 3 business locations
- 100 reviews per month
- Manual + Auto-publish modes
- Full customization
- Email notifications

### Pro Plan - $79/month ($790/year)
For businesses serious about reputation:
- 5 business locations
- 250 reviews per month
- All Basic features
- **Analytics & Insights**
- **Weekly AI Summary emails**
- Priority support

> **Note**: Annual billing saves 20% • No credit card required • Cancel anytime

## How It Works

### 1. Connect Your Google Account
- One-click OAuth 2.0 connection
- No passwords needed
- Secure Google Business Profile integration
- Instant access to your reviews

### 2. Configure Your Preferences
- Choose tone of voice (5 minutes)
- Set response language
- Customize per-rating instructions
- Add business details and signature

### 3. Receive Automated Responses
- AI detects new reviews via Google Pub/Sub
- Generates personalized response within minutes
- Analyzes review content and sentiment
- Applies your customization rules

### 4. Review & Publish
- Approve, edit, or regenerate AI responses
- Publish to Google with one click
- Or enable auto-publish for hands-free operation
- Track all responses in dashboard

## Use Cases

### Restaurant Owners
"Bottie saves us 5+ hours every week. We get 20-30 reviews weekly, and responding to each personally was impossible. Now our AI responds professionally while we focus on customers."

**Configuration**:
- Tone: Friendly
- 5-star: Thank for dining, invite to return
- 1-star: Apologize, offer phone call with manager

### Multi-Location Retail
"Managing reviews across 3 stores was a nightmare. Bottie centralizes everything and each location has its own AI personality."

**Configuration**:
- Store A (Downtown): Professional tone
- Store B (Mall): Friendly tone
- Store C (Outlet): Casual tone

### Service Professionals (Salons, Clinics, Lawyers)
"Client reviews are critical for our reputation. Bottie ensures we respond to every review with our professional brand voice, even when we're with clients."

**Configuration**:
- Tone: Professional
- Auto-publish: 4-5 stars
- Manual review: 1-3 stars (sensitive situations)

### Agencies Managing Multiple Clients
"We manage Google Business for 5 clients. Bottie's multi-location support means we handle all reviews from one dashboard."

**Configuration**:
- Different tone per client
- Client-specific signatures
- Per-client analytics

## Benefits

### Time Savings
- **Before Bottie**: 10-15 minutes per review response
- **With Bottie**: 30 seconds to approve or edit
- **ROI**: Save 5-20 hours per month

### Improved Response Rate
- Respond to 100% of reviews (vs. typical 20-30%)
- Reply within minutes, not days
- Show customers you care about feedback

### Better Reputation
- Consistent brand voice across all responses
- Professional handling of negative reviews
- Increased engagement leads to better ratings

### Customer Insights
- Understand trends in customer feedback
- Identify recurring issues before they escalate
- Celebrate what customers love

### Peace of Mind
- Never miss a review again
- Automated notifications keep you informed
- AI handles responses even when you're busy

## Integrations

### Google Business Profile (Google My Business)
- Official Google API integration
- Real-time review notifications via Google Pub/Sub
- Automatic reply posting
- Multi-location support

### Google Gemini AI
- State-of-the-art language model
- Context-aware response generation
- Natural, human-like writing
- Multilingual support

### Email Delivery
- Review notifications
- Weekly AI summaries
- Account updates

### Stripe
- Secure payment processing
- Subscription management
- Usage tracking

## Security & Privacy

- **OAuth 2.0**: Never store your Google password
- **Data Encryption**: All data encrypted at rest and in transit
- **GDPR Compliant**: Right to access, correction, deletion, and data portability
- **Secure Storage**: PostgreSQL with Row-Level Security
- **Privacy Policy**: Full transparency on data usage
- **Terms of Service**: Clear usage guidelines

### 5-Minute Setup
1. Sign up at https://bottie.app
2. Connect your Google Business account
3. Choose your business location
4. Configure AI preferences
5. Start receiving automated responses

### No Credit Card Required
- Start with Free plan (10 reviews/month)
- Upgrade when you need more capacity
- Cancel anytime, no commitments

### Onboarding Support
- Step-by-step guided setup
- In-app tooltips and help
- Email support for questions

## Language Support

### User Interface
- English (en)
- Hebrew (he)
- Fully localized dashboard and settings

### AI Responses
- English
- Hebrew
- Auto-detect (responds in review's language)

### RTL Support
Full right-to-left layout for Hebrew users

## Common Questions

### What types of businesses use Bottie?
Any business with a Google Business Profile: restaurants, retail stores, salons, clinics, law firms, agencies, service providers, multi-location chains.

### Does the AI sound robotic?
No. Bottie uses Google's Gemini 2.5 Flash, which generates natural, context-aware responses. You can customize tone and style to match your brand.

### Can I edit AI responses before publishing?
Yes. The default mode requires manual approval. You can edit, regenerate, or reject any response before it goes live.

### What if I want full automation?
Enable auto-publish mode to automatically post all responses, or use hybrid mode to auto-publish positive reviews only.

### Do you store my Google password?
No. We use OAuth 2.0, which means you log in through Google directly. We never see or store your password.

### Can I manage multiple locations?
Yes. Plans include 1-5 locations depending on tier. Each location can have custom AI settings.

### What happens to my data if I cancel?
You can export your data anytime. After cancellation, data is retained for 30 days then permanently deleted.

### Is there a free trial?
The Free plan is available forever with 10 reviews/month. Upgrade when you need more capacity.

### What if AI generates an inappropriate response?
Extremely rare, but that's why manual approval mode exists. Review before publishing. You can also regenerate or reject.

### Can I use this for platforms besides Google?
Currently, Bottie focuses exclusively on Google Business Profile reviews for the best integration experience.

## Support

### Getting Help
- **Email**: support@bottie.app
- **Documentation**: Help center in dashboard
- **Response Time**: Within 24 hours (priority for Pro users)

### Feature Requests
We actively listen to customer feedback. Request features at support@bottie.app or through the dashboard.

## Roadmap

Upcoming features:
- More integrations (Yelp, Facebook, TripAdvisor)
- Bulk actions for review management
- Custom AI training on your brand voice
- Advanced analytics with competitor comparison
- Mobile app (iOS/Android)

## About Bottie

Bottie was built to solve a real problem: business owners drowning in review management. We believe every review deserves a response, and AI can help businesses maintain their reputation without sacrificing hours every week.

Our mission is to make professional review management accessible to businesses of all sizes, using cutting-edge AI while maintaining the human touch that customers appreciate.

---

**Start managing your reviews smarter, not harder.**

Try Bottie free at https://bottie.app - No credit card required.
